title: Ripple’s XRP: Empowering Cross-Border Movements with Trustless and Instant Transactions
description: XRP is a cryptocurrency token designed to migrate transactions from central databases controlled by financial institutions to a more open infrastructure while significantly cutting costs. XRP transactions are trustless, instant, and cheap, putting them at an advantage for cross-border movements. XRP is highlighted as a revolutionary cryptocurrency token with a mission to transform transaction processes [...]
